purposeDescriptions.low: causes stone to crumble and crack into rubble
purposeDescriptions.mid: causes stone to crumble into a pile of sand
purposeDescriptions.high: causes stone to fall apart in a puff of fine dust
purposeDescriptions.invLow: solidifies rubble into solid rock for a short time
purposeDescriptions.invMid: solidifies sand into stable, solid rock for a short time
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: presses find dusts into stable, solid rock for a short time
